name: Avoid classes having too many children (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Classes with an excessive number of children. A class is considered as having too many children if there are more than 15.
output:
This report lists all the Classes with an excessive number of children.

This QR provides the following information:
Class full name.
rationale: A class with an excessive number of children is an indicator of an unbalanced class hierarchy. You should consider refactoring this class hierarchy.
remediation: Review the architecture of the application.
